q1.question: Is my data safe?
q1.answer: Yes. Astro communicates directly with your Immich server. Your photos and API keys never leave your devices.

q2.question: Is Astro free?
q2.answer: Astro is a paid app to support development, but we may offer a TestFlight or trial version.

q3.question: Do I need an Immich server?
q3.answer: Yes, Astro is a third-party client for Immich. You need to host your own Immich instance.

q4.question: Does it support video?
q4.answer: Yes, Astro supports smooth video playback and scrubbing.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.lead: Your privacy is critically important to us. At Astro, we have a few fundamental principles:
principles: We don't ask you for personal information.
We don't share your personal information with anyone except to comply with the law, develop our products, or protect our rights.
We don't store personal information on our servers unless required for the on-going operation of one of our services.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: Astro is a client for <0>Immich</0>. This means:
items: <0>Your Photos & Videos</0>: These are strictly communicated between your device and your personal Immich server. We (the developers of Astro) do not have access to them.
<0>Credentials</0>: Your server URL and API keys are stored securely on your device (using iOS Keychain) and are never sent to us.

sections.title: 2. Analytics & Crash Reports
sections.content: We do not collect behavioral analytics (e.g., which buttons you click).
sections.extra: Apple may collect anonymized crash reports and usage statistics depending on your device settings. This data helps us fix bugs and improve performance but contains no personally identifiable information.

sections.title: 3. Location Data
sections.content: Astro may request access to your photo library location data to display your memories on a map. This processing happens entirely on your device or your server. We do not track your location.

sections.title: 4. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage visitors to frequently check this page for any changes. Your continued use of the app after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

sections.title: 5. Contact
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at <0>{email}</0>.
